channel.title: Julián Úsuga Ortiz | Blog
channel.description: Personal blog about data science, statistics, and software development

item.title: How to Use Claude Code
item.description: This guide explains the core concepts, agents, and tools available in Claude Code, and shows a practical case of running multiple agents in parallel.
item.author: Julian Úsuga

item.title: Speed in Relational DB Management Systems
item.description: A comparative study of processing speed across three popular DBMS - SQLite, MySQL, and PostgreSQL - analyzing performance with text data using a multi-factor experimental model.
item.author: Julián Úsuga

item.title: Speed in SQL DBMS
item.description: A comparative study of processing speed across three popular DBMS (SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL) to help determine which database to use for different scenarios.
item.author: Julián Úsuga

item.title: Modeling Survival times in African countries using rstanarm
item.description: In this study we used a Bayesian Approach to model survival times of the people in different African countries.
item.author: Julián Úsuga
